snippet: Jacqueline Galant stepped down after the publication of leaked reports warning of security deficiencies at Brussels Airport, which was bombed on March 22.
abstract: Belgium's transportation minister Jacqueline Galant resigns following publications of leaked reports from European Commission warning of security deficiencies at Brussels Airport; resignation marks highest-level departure so far as result of Brussels attacks.

byline.contributor: Lilia Blaise contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: Jacqueline Galant stepped down after the publication of leaked reports warning of security deficiencies at Brussels Airport, which was bombed on March 22.

headline.main: Belgium’s Transportation Minister Resigns Amid Outcry
headline.print_headline: Belgium’s Transportation Minister Resigns Amid Outcry Over Warnings About Security
